description: Support for environment modules (Lmod, Environment Modules) in Positron
configuration.title: Environment Modules
configuration.enabled.description: Enable environment modules support for runtime discovery on Unix-like systems
configuration.moduleCommand.description: The command used to interact with the module system (default: 'module')
configuration.moduleLoadTimeout.descript: Timeout in milliseconds for loading modules
configuration.initScript.description: Path to module system initialization script (e.g., '/etc/profile.d/modules.sh'). Leave empty to use default detection.
configuration.environments.description: Named environment configurations. Each key is an environment name, and the value specifies target languages and modules to load.
configuration.environments.modules.descr: List of modules to load (in order)
command.refreshEnvironments.title: Refresh Module Environments
command.diagnosticsReport.title: Generate Diagnostics Report
command.manageEnvironments.title: Manage Module Environments
